title: Organic Herbal Elixir Energy
description: 100% natural food supplement, with Ginseng & Ginger that helps boost energy and reduce fatigue thanks to its adaptogenic and active plant extracts.
text:
Main ingredients
Propolis extract: it is the resinous substance that bees collect to seal and disinfect the hive. Rich in flavonoids, phenols, and terpenes, which offer unique properties in stimulating the body’s defenses.
Panax 4: 1 Ginseng Extract (10% ginseng): adaptogenic plant that increases physical performance and endurance by promoting sugar and lactic acid breakdown. The ginsenosides act in the body according to need: calming ginsenosides act in stress situations and, when a higher performance is needed, stimulating ginsenosides act.
Siberian Ginseng Extract 8: 1 (eleutherosides B + E min. 0.8%): contributes to more physical and mental energy, is tonic in cases of weakness, exhaustion and tiredness and supports the body’s natural defenses. Tonic for the support of mental and physical capacities in cases of weakness, exhaustion and tiredness, and during convalescence, recovery and rehabilitation.
Ginger: helps boost energy, vitality and reduces fatigue, while having important antioxidant properties.
Innovation
Organic Herbal Elixirs are 100% natural, without preservatives, synthetics, sugar, or sweeteners while remaining delicious. At the same time, they are very easy to use and with a single dose, you get the required amount of ingredients you need. They consist of innovative active extracts of herbs & propolis as well as adaptogenic & nootropic herbs without additional vitamins & trace elements. The plant extracts come from titrated medicinal plants with traditional medicinal health benefits and propolis. Adaptogens are herbal substances that help our body manage stress and maintain balance or homeostasis: They help us adapt to external stressors. By boosting our internal systems, adaptogens can boost vitality, stabilize mood, and improve performance and concentration. They help the body develop stress resistance and mitigate its further effects.
Preparation Instructions
(adults and children> 12 years old)
Αdd a sachet of 3g daily in 200 ml of water, tea, juice or yogurt and smoothies. You can also create a completely naturally enhanced and healthy meal by adding it to yogurt, creating your delicious super bowl.
Be symbiotic
Combine Organic Herbal Elixir Energy with our organic thyme honey, for more energy, health, and wellness.
Tip: You can add to your yogurt for extra flavor a spoonful of organic functional honey with Ginger or propolis for extra antioxidant properties and energy.
Useful info
Do not exceed the daily dose. Dietary supplements should not be used as a substitute for a balanced diet. This product is not intended to prevent, treat, or cure any human disease. Consult your doctor if you are pregnant, breast-feeding, taking medication or have any health problems.
Keep out of reach of children under 3 years.
Store in a dry and cool place away from heat and sun exposure.
The product is not subject to a marketing authorization by EOF
EOF Notification No: 8256/28-01-2022
Organic Herbal Elixir Energy
45g
Organic Herbal Elixir Energy is a 100% natural food supplement, with Ginseng & Ginger that helps boost energy and reduce fatigue thanks to its adaptogenic and active plant extracts.
